BrightBlade, Rage

*BrightBlade sighed and kept running, Megatron's signature was getting 
closer!*

"I tried to get into the Maximal base before I met you, I didn't get far. 
Now watch where you're going, if you knock yourself out on a tree I'm going 
to leave you behind, got it? This mission's to important to be stalled by an 
unconsious arachnid!"

* BrightBlade ran on until her scanners detected Megatron's signature just 
over the next rise. She stopped and crouched down low, now the real test 
began!*

" Gangon!" she whispered," Stay low and keep quiet, our target is just over 
the next hill."

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

*Rage sniffed the ground, she had left the metal object behind and had 
circled around to see if she could approach it at another angle. But now she 
was following a trail, one that smelled delicious! It was the trail of a 
wolf and something else, she couldn't put her claw on the exact smell of the 
second though.
Rage stalked through the boulders and sand, the trail was fresh!
She followed the trail of the wolf to the top of a boulder then followed it 
down, that was when she saw them...her meals!
They were walking towards the metal thing that intimidated her so much, if 
she could catch them before they reached the metal thing then she just might 
be able to eat her dinner!
Rage straightened up to her full height and glared at her targets, food!
With that she snarled and ran towards her prey, her empty stomach growling 
with the thought of being full!!*
